data.text: @ThaiNewsReports What is the point of keeping score on how many people have flu?

@ThaiNewsReports They are doing this because US CDC has a matrix that will issue travel advisory if ratio of COVID reaches certain percent.  So geniuses will discontinue the number..like North Korea.  No worries, there will be public outcry and they will do a 180
@ZaphodV @ThaiNewsReports How hard do you cry when you see things like this? Actually, don't tell me, don't want to waste any more of my time 👋 https://t.co/pp33FJfDHg

@didduediligence @ThaiNewsReports You say this like the virus gives a good goddamn what you, me or anyone else thinks or is "tired of".
I've been leaving home the entire time, tyvm. But I'll continue to take sensible precautions. https://t.co/hjbWbish3F

@ZaphodV @ThaiNewsReports You triple mask, have a monthly booster and don't leave home if you want but the tide has turned in Europe and won't be long before here too which you won't like but you'll have to accept 😋

@didduediligence @ThaiNewsReports Not wrong. Else the 190k under care wouldn't have 60k of them recovering at home. 
https://t.co/Hi3mtmfgI0
@ZaphodV @ThaiNewsReports Wrong again, maybe soon though. https://t.co/qEmB7dCXUW
@ZaphodV @ThaiNewsReports USA has a population of 300mn and currently 54k C19 hospitalisations yet you believe that Thailand, with under 70mn population, has 130k genuine C19 hospitalisations 😂

@ZaphodV @ThaiNewsReports That was last week and only 46%, not sure what you're making up now 🙄
In USA where there's 300mn+ there's currently 54k  C19 hospitalisations yet you believe in Thailand with a population less than 70mn there's much more 🤦‍♂️
